summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 16th avenue Southwest, from West Hanford Street to a point approximately 412 feet south of the Inner Harbor Line; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8223 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
